name: Gnyan
movement: walks at a speed of 50 feet
description: Gnyan is a large elemental creature embodying winter, featuring an aura of hope and the ability to heal and restore allies with its Glorious Milk.
memorable: Gnyan's ability to heal allies and bolster their morale makes it a unique presence on the battlefield, along with its vulnerability to fire.
goals: Gnyan aims to support its allies, control the battlefield, and embody the essence of winter.
relations: Often associated with other elemental creatures and beings related to winter.
environment: Typically found in snowy and icy regions.
strengths: Immunity to cold and poison damage, strong mobility, and the ability to bolster allies' morale.
attacks: Features bite and claw attacks that deal piercing and slashing damage, enhanced with cold damage, alongside the powerful Avalanche’s Roar.
most_powerful_ability: Avalanche’s Roar creates a damaging cone of ice and snow that restrains targets, providing excellent battlefield control.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 15, enabling it to detect hidden threats effectively.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to notice details and detect hidden creatures.
additional_information: Aura of Hope granting advantage on saving throws against fear for allies.
Glorious Milk can heal and reduce exhaustion levels.
Snow Camouflage provides advantage on stealth checks in snowy terrains.
Snow Strider ability allows it to move without leaving traces in the snow.
Can teleport short distances using Snow Step, adding to its mobility.
test_queries: large winter elemental that heals allies
creature with aura of hope and restorative milk
mobile ice creature that can teleport
elemental that controls ice and snow in battle
supportive monster vulnerable to fire attacks
